overview: In The Fall of Camp Blood, we pick up following the events of Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter. Camp Blood has been shutdown after the gruesome murders occurred. Before the demolition of the site, a group of teenagers must venture to empty their parents cabin before it's destroyed. It doesn't take long before they remember why it was shut down in the first place. These are Jason's woods, and anyone who enters must deal with the consequences.
tagline: You can change the name. You can destroy the camp. But these will always be Jason's woods.
title: The Fall of Camp Blood
